name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Senior Quality Engineer with a strong background in software testing and development, leveraging expertise in tools such as **Git**, **Pytest**, and **Appium**. Proficient in **Python** and **Shell scripting** with a solid understanding of **POSIX** systems and **embedded systems**, bringing 9+ years of experience in delivering high-quality software solutions. Familiar with **Android**, **QNX**, and automotive technologies such as **CAN** and **Ethernet**. Demonstrated analytical skills and problem-solving abilities that enhance product quality, along with effective communication and collaboration skills that drive team success in fast-paced environments.

experience.responsibilities:
Performed comprehensive **software testing** across multiple platforms, ensuring high-quality delivery and compliance with industry standards.
Utilized **Python** for automating test scripts and analysis, improving testing efficiency by **30%**.
Employed **Shell scripting** for the automation of routine tasks, reducing manual intervention and increasing productivity.
Applied **QNX** and **embedded systems** knowledge to effectively test automotive software.
Collaborated with development teams using **Git** for version control, resulting in streamlined workflows and enhanced team communication.
Leveraged analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve complex systems issues, enhancing overall product reliability.
Designed and executed test cases in **Appium** for mobile applications on **Android**, ensuring full functionality and performance.
Implemented **HIL** (Hardware-in-the-Loop) testing strategies to validate embedded system interfaces and response times.
Engaged in continuous communication with cross-functional teams, fostering collaboration and enhancing team synergy.
Developed testing frameworks using **Pytest**, contributing to improved modular test design and reusability.
Utilized **CAN** and **Ethernet** protocols in automotive systems testing, ensuring compatibility and adherence to standards.
Provided detailed reporting and documentation of testing results, contributing to project transparency and stakeholder engagement.

Implemented robust **software testing** strategies using **Python** and **Pytest**, ensuring a minimum of 95% test coverage across all new codebases.
Utilized **Shell scripting** to automate testing workflows, decreasing manual testing time by 40%.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to define quality standards and development timelines, leading to a 20% reduction in project timelines.
Conducted comprehensive system validation for **embedded systems** in the **automotive** domain, streamlining the testing process for **Android** applications running on **QNX**.
Utilized **Git** for version control, managing code repositories for better team collaboration and accountability.
Employed **HIL (Hardware-in-the-Loop)** testing techniques to simulate real-world scenarios, identifying critical issues early in the development process.
Tested and validated **CAN** and **Ethernet** communication protocols, ensuring system reliability and compliance with industry standards.
Developed automation scripts for mobile app testing using **Appium**, enhancing automated test coverage by 30%.
Exhibited strong **analytical skills** and **problem-solving** abilities while troubleshooting complex issues during testing phases.
Conducted training and mentorship sessions for junior engineers, fostering continuous skill development within the team.

Utilized **Python** and **Shell scripting** to automate testing processes, enhancing software testing efficiency by **30%**.
Employed **Git** for version control and collaborative code management, ensuring seamless integration within the development lifecycle.
Conducted thorough software testing for embedded systems, focusing on **automotive** applications to guarantee compliance with industry standards.
Developed test scripts using **Pytest** and **Appium** for automated testing of mobile applications, improving test coverage by **25%**.
Analyzed and debugged system issues in **QNX** and **Android** environments to provide effective problem-solving solutions during the testing phase.
Engaged in effective collaboration with cross-functional teams to enhance communication and alignment on project requirements.
Participated in HIL testing to validate system performance under simulated conditions, ensuring optimal functionality of automotive components.
Worked closely with POSIX compliance to manage system resources, improving software reliability and stability in embedded systems.
Leveraged analytical skills to identify potential bottlenecks within existing applications, recommending actionable improvements.
Authored detailed technical documentation and test plans to facilitate knowledge sharing and enhance team efficiency.
